committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Revitalization and Regulatory Reform Act of 1976 to require the Secretary of Transportation to conduct a study of rail freight service in the Northeast Corridor.
short_title: Northeast Corridor Rail Freight Act of 1981

summary.text: Northeast Corridor Rail Freight Act of 1981 - Amends the Railroad Revitalization and Regulatory Reform Act of 1976 to direct the Secretary of Transportation to study specified aspects of rail freight service in the Northeast Corridor. Directs the Secretary to establish an advisory committee to assist in conducting such study.

titles.title: Northeast Corridor Rail Freight Act of 1981
A bill to amend the Railroad Revitalization and Regulatory Reform Act of 1976 to require the Secretary of Transportation to conduct a study of rail freight service in the Northeast Corridor.
